description: Often, organizations will split this product offerings into "Business Units". Business Units are supported by different Sales Teams
Whether the person is known to the database (Contact) or is net new (Lead)
Industry of the person being identified as a lead
Sales team which will be working the lead (Often determined by industry and product combinations)
Activity channel the person took to become a lead
Product of interest of the lead
Target variable. This is the metric we are utilizing to determine a success (1) or a failure (0)
